meanings.sent2: The antipornography campaign aimed to raise awareness about the harmful effects of explicit content.
meanings.sent3: The antipornography activist always carried protest signs to fight against inappropriate material.
meanings.sent4: Her antipornography stance was unwavering, like a shield against indecency.
meanings.sent5: The community praised her for her antipornography efforts to protect children from harmful content.

meanings.definition: A person or organization that actively works against the production or consumption of pornography.
meanings.sent1: The antipornography group organized rallies to combat the spread of explicit material.
meanings.sent2: As an antipornography advocate, he dedicated his life to fighting against the porn industry.
meanings.sent3: The antipornography team brainstormed creative ways to discourage the creation of inappropriate content.
meanings.sent4: She was a beacon of hope in the antipornography movement, guiding others towards a cleaner media environment.
meanings.sent5: The antipornography organization received widespread support for their efforts to promote a more wholesome society.
